```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(desertsprings)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(scales)
library(lubridate)

conn <- OpenDatabaseConnection()
```

```{r plots}
plot <- FullFlowCategoriesAnnualPlot(conn)

plot
```

``` {r plots2}
FullFlowCategoriesThreeYearPlot(conn)
FullFlowCategoriesAnnualHeatMap(conn)
FullFlowCategoriesThreeYearHeatMap(conn)
```
